title: When Are We Getting Skate 4? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.19.20
description:
Blessing and Greg recap EA Play Live 2020 and talk about how far off the new Skate game is. 

Time Stamps - 
 00:00:00 - Start
00:02:20 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
Mohammed Mohammed, Conner Nolan, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:15:00 - EA Play Live Wrap-up - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:16:32 - Why announce a game (presumably) so so far from release? Do you think a new skate game was even on EA's radar before the Tony Hawk remaster was announced to overwhelming support? - Best Friends Q:Evan M
00:39:38 - Do you think we will have to wait an entire year until we see the next round of tent pole EA games? - Best Friends Q:Mavryk
00:43:12 - Crash 4 has leaked - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:47:25 - We’ll soon know more about that new Smash character
00:49:10 - Out today
00:51:50 - Reader mail   -
00:52:50 - New Pokemon Snap, a new Skate game, Patapon 2 Remastered. These are games that the Internet and Greg Miller seemingly willed into existence. What game would you like to see the Internet push for next? - GroovyMuse
00:57:00 - Squad Up:The Nano Biologist(Twitch) - twitch.tv/TheNanoBiologist
00:58:00 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday: Blessing and Fran
Tuesday: Blessing and Tim
Wednesday: Greg and Gary (maybe)
Thursday: Greg and Blessing
Friday: Greg and Tim
